bibl.title: The Role of the Copts in the Islamic Navigation in the 7th and 8th Centuries: The Papyrological Evidence.
bibl.note: Focuses on the role of the Copts (i.e. the Christian Egyptians) in the construction of the Islamic navy and in the naval expeditions of the Muslims against the Byzantines.
bibl.seg: MUHAMMAD Tarek M., The Role of the Copts in the Islamic Navigation in the 7th and 8th Centuries: The Papyrological Evidence.
Focuses on the role of the Copts (i.e. the Christian Egyptians) in the construction of the Islamic navy and in the naval expeditions of the Muslims against the Byzantines.
